questions.question: What is the predominant color of the frames, as visually apparent from the side profile, excluding any lens color?
Considering the side view, what appears to be the primary material used in the construction of the temple arms?
What color, based on visual observation, is the section of the temple arms near the hinge, different from the rest?
Based on the image, what is the overall shape of the sunglasses, considering the profile view?
Judging solely from the image, what appears to be the material of the thinner section of the arms, closer to the hinges?
From the side view, what is the apparent texture of the main frame material, smooth or rough?
What is the visible design feature of the connection where the temple arms join the main frame?
Does the side profile suggest a discernible pattern or print on the sunglasses' frame?
From this angle, are there any noticeable embellishments or decorative elements on the frame?
Judging by the image, what seems to be the overall style of the sunglasses, classic or modern?
From the presented side profile, how would you describe the apparent thickness of the frames?
Does the side profile clearly reveal the presence of any visible brand logos or markings?
Based only on what's shown, how many pieces compose each temple arm, visibly?
What is the apparent curvature of the temple arms visible in this side profile view?
Judging from the side view, what is the apparent finish of the metal parts, matte or shiny?
